answers.answer: They tested me at 5 weeks and confirmed that I had it
Wow, that's early :-( Have they talked to you about their plan for management? Dietitian?
That's crazy I have to wait till sept 8th to find out.
My dr does it at 28wks but he checked my urine at first appointment and said I wasn't leaking sugars. Is that how they picked it up for you?
Well not really I like to go in depth with things my problem is idk why its as high as it is because I barely eat anything it surprises me that its up that high
They had checked my first blood test and they have a tool I guess that check sugars 3 months back

question: I'm 17 weeks and I have gestational diabetes and it is getting worse , what type of diets are out there that I can take?
title: gestational diabetes
